description.value:
[Addictive] For 1 Hour, User becomes sensitive to light, suffer -10 to Vision-based Tests whilst in Bright Light, but +10 to Awareness Tests everywhere else. Afterwards make Toughness Test or gain 1 Fatigue.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
